segments.text: do you like animals ? I really like dogs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so do i . I don ’ t like cats .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why ? I think cats are ok .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t bear being near cats . They don ’ t seem to like me either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like wild animals . I don ’ t like spiders and snakes . I think spiders and snakes are disgusting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m fond of snakes . I think they ’ re great . I agree with you about spiders though . I think spiders are horrible . I think it ’ s because they have so many legs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think bears are wonderful . Pandas are fantastic . I low the people who kill them for their fur .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . I ’ m carry about mice . I think they ’ re so cute !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? I don ’ t see the attraction . I ’ m afraid of mice .
segments.speaker: S1
